thread.title: Badass golden eagle mauls deer to death after savage WWE-style takedown
thread.title_full: Badass golden eagle mauls deer to death after savage WWE-style takedown

title: Badass golden eagle mauls deer to death after savage WWE-style takedown
text:
Badass golden eagle mauls deer to death after savage WWE-style takedown Badass golden eagle mauls deer to death after savage WWE-style takedown A SHOCKED wildlife photographer lucked out after capturing stunning footage of a golden eagle laying a WWE-style suplex on a deer. / Published 22nd February 2017 
The video shows the giant predatory bird giving chase to its prey across an open plain. 
But the young foal cannot find shelter in time as the winged hunter swoops from above, before snatching its prey in its giant claws and slamming it down onto its head. 
Pinned to the floor by the monster bird’s razor sharp talons, the baby deer has no chance. 
YOUTUBE SAVAGE: A giant golden eagle was filmed performing WWE-style moves on its prey 
Viewers were stunned by the incredible scene, posted on social media site Reddit earlier this week. 
“I thought the title would be an exaggeration,” wrote one user. 
“But nope. That bird genuinely just suplexed a deer. Badass.” 
YOUTUBE MONSTER KILLERS: The huge birds can reach a wingspan of more than 7ft Eagle Flight Screenshots Monday, 13th June 2016 Eagle Flight gives players the chance to soar freely through an abandoned Paris as eagles, moving their heads to steer as they swoop through alleyways and dogfight with avian enemies 1 / 6 
Another comment simply read: “F*
